Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Oceancrest Drive and Leviathan Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue runs east and west through the center of the town, eventually ending up at the eastern entrance to the city. Leviathan Drive runs north and south, making a direct path from the northern City Walls all the way to the southern City Walls without interruption.
